text: Hi Everyone! We were getting ready to submit a template pack to the Marketplace today, but we saw this message: <https://www.dropbox.com/s/pfp1zcy6j19r0vi/Screen%20Shot%202020-08-28%20at%201.27.00%20PM.png?dl=0>
Was this announced somewhere and I totally missed it? I know themes are the next standard, but this pack was being created back in April
It was announced back in July. Check the <#CEQQ9NFK2|releases-and-updates> channel
